channel.title: Im sorry but a really dumb question
channel.description:
ok im going to be made fun of a lot for this but..........
ok here goes
how to i use a gif image as my avatar, iv tried before but it doesnt animate:'(
im really confused on how to get this to work cuz i tried it as my avatar and it didnt animate and then i tried it as my signiture and it didnt animate..
WHAT AM I DOIN WRONG!!!!!!?????

item.title: Im sorry but a really dumb question
item.dc:creator: Jingles
item.description:
ManlyStump:

That was very crafty of you Ram!

Indeed

Read full topic
item.source: Im sorry but a really dumb question

item.title: Im sorry but a really dumb question
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Raminator:

Your image needs to be less than 64KB and less than 128 x 128 pixels. If the .gif satisfies both of those images, send it to me in a PM and I’ll fix it for you.[COLOR=‘DimGray’]…for a moderate fee.

That was very crafty of you Ram!

Read full topic
